title: Analysis of Educational Effectiveness and Design Strategies for Computer-Based Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Experience utilizing computer-based learning tools and practical experience in social sciences
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning module operation in limited-technology environments, flexible learning progression considering practitioners' work schedules, and verification of educational effectiveness through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three design principles of computer-based learning modules and apply them to practical cases
Learners can propose five strategies for designing effective microlearning content in mobile environments.
Learners can suggest three operational approaches to enhance learner engagement in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
